name: Gunship Bike Rider Ground Force Strike: Tanks Battle Action Games
name_original: Gunship Bike Rider Ground Force Strike: Tanks Battle Action Games
description:
Gunship Bike is tank Destroying Mission game , your bike is equipped with short range missiles, rescue you bike as long as possible from attack of enemy tanks and destroy all enemy tanks using short range missile shooting system.


If you fail to rescue your biker ,try again to complete this mission.
Race the bike and drift to avowing incoming missiles , no space to hide so keep your bike in full race mode ,and Drive the bike carefully to avoid obstacles.

Hill map with attractive environment.
Climb over the bridge to view all enemies,don't try to get closer to mountain hills ,invisible border will crash your bike.
